name: Local Food Tour
description: Our  "local" 3-hour food tasting and shopping tour offers a local’s view into Mexican culture through its delicious and intricate and history rich cuisine. Suitable for all age groups and fitness levels, Food Hoppers Playa del Carmen guides will take you on a culinary and cultural adventure. Experience off-the-beaten path eateries and their colorful owners and staff, taco stands and regional delicacies. Walk away with an enriched understanding of  Mexican food, a more than satisfied stomach and new insight to continue on your discovery of authentic Mexican food.
